review: Had a love/hate relationship with this thing for a few months.  It worked great for the first few months.  Super fast response time.  Super fast buffer time (never lagged).  Then all of a sudden for a few months it would barely work.  I'd start a movie and it either wouldn't play it or it would reboot.  It was very frustrating and my wife almost threw it out the window several times trying to watch The Good Wife, to no avail.  However, recently it's worked perfectly again so I'm not sure what the problem was.  Hopefully it's been fixed for good.
